name: net.featherly.shawn.inputsharedevice
description: UnityEngine.InputSystem extensions for sharing a single device with multiple players, prebuilt UI for rebinding actions, and multiple players selecting UI from a single canvas. Rebinding combines UnityEngine.InputSystem.Samples.RebindUI , Sasquatch B https://youtu.be/qXbjyzBlduY , Samyam https://youtu.be/csqVa2Vimao
